item.title: Trisara Phuket is embracing digital technology with its newest addition to the guest services portfolio
item.description: Trisara Phuket introduces “The Director’s Den” (DDen), a first-of-its-kind digital lounge for guests to elevate their vacation memories. This unique service offers professional photo and video production, complete with storytelling and editing, to deliver shareable content within 24 hours. Kittisak Pattamasaevi, VP of Sales and Marketing at Montara Hospitality Group, which owns and manages Trisara, highlighted that luxury travelers often seek to capture their experiences but may lack the time or skills to do so effectively.

item.title: Helping Your Business Achieve Hyperconnectivity
item.description: By: John Shepler It took a whole generation to connect the entire world to the internet. Now, get ready for an even bigger change: we’re moving towards hyperconnectivity, and it’s happening fast. Everything, Everywhere, All at Once Hyperconnectivity means that anything and anyone who can be connected will be connected all the time. We’ve already shifted from logging in to having always-on internet for our computers and phones. The next step is to let our devices communicate with each other without us.
